Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Busulfan levels were measured by a gas chromatographic - mass spectrometry assay in the plasma and cerebrospinal fluid of 9 children without central nervous system disease under 600 mg / m2 busulfan with clonazepam : busulfan cerebrospinal fluid : plasma ratio was 1 . 39 .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| central nervous system disease |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions "children without central nervous system disease". Here, "central nervous system disease" is the disease entity mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| central nervous system disease |

Explanation:

The paragraph mentions "children without central nervous system disease". Here, "central nervous system disease" is the disease entity mentioned in the paragraph. The phrase "without" indicates the absence of the disease, and "children" refers to the population being studied. Therefore, the only clear disease entity mentioned is "central nervous system disease".

Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Busulfan levels were measured by a gas chromatographic - mass spectrometry assay in the plasma and cerebrospinal fluid of 9 children without central nervous system disease under 600 mg / m2 busulfan with clonazepam : busulfan cerebrospinal fluid : plasma ratio was 1 . 39 .

| Chemical |
| --- |

Explanation:

The chemical entities in the paragraph are "busulfan" and "clonazepam". These are the only words in the paragraph that refer to specific chemical compounds. They are mentioned as being administered to the children and having their levels measured in the study.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

The word "clonazepam" does not clearly refer to a "Chemical" in the context of the paragraph. It is mentioned in the same phrase as "busulfan", but it is not described as being measured or having any levels. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for being a chemical entity in this paragraph.

On the other hand, "busulfan" is clearly described as being measured and having levels, so it is a chemical entity.
